code:
// return the user data from the session storage
export var getUser=function getUser(){var userStr=sessionStorage.getItem('user');if(userStr)return JSON.parse(userStr);else return null;};// return the token from the session storage
export var getToken=function getToken(){return sessionStorage.getItem('token')||null;};// remove the token and user from the session storage
export var removeUserSession=function removeUserSession(){sessionStorage.removeItem('token');sessionStorage.removeItem('user');};// set the token and user from the session storage
export var setUserSession=function setUserSession(token,user){sessionStorage.setItem('token',token);sessionStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(user));};// return stored methods
export var getMethod=function getMethod(){var mStr=localStorage.getItem('method');if(mStr)return JSON.parse(mStr);else return null;};// return stored frequency
export var getFreq=function getFreq(){var fStr=localStorage.getItem('freq');if(fStr)return JSON.parse(fStr);else return null;};
